# dash-theme-toggle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description   | Type                | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ------------- | ------------------- | --------- |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Current theme | `"dark" \| "light"` | `'light'` |


## Events

| Event                   | Description                    | Type                |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------- |
| `dashThemeToggleChange` | Emitted when the theme changed | `CustomEvent<void>` |
